name: LD44 - Veggies For Life
description:
You are a farmer struggling to make ends meet in a dystopian society where time is both the currency and life. Humans live by the clock and when the time (Shown on the hand) runs out people die

NOT AT ALL LIKE THE MOVIE "IN TIME" BTW :)  

Try to select the appropriate crop based on the weather and soil type.
A badly chosen crop will not reward enough "time" while a good crop will make you rich
